title: Constant-Round Concurrent Zero-Knowledge from Indistinguishability Obfuscation.
abstract: We present a constant-round concurrent zero-knowledge protocol for \({\mathsf {NP}} \). Our protocol relies on the existence of families of collision-resistant hash functions, one-way permutations, and indistinguishability obfuscators for \(\mathbf{P}/poly\) (with slightly super-polynomial security).
